website_summaries.verdict: If basil, chives, and parsley is all you need, this kit contains top-quality seeds plus accessories to grow them.
pros: A complete kit that comes with non-GMO basil, chive, and parsley seeds with pots, grow pellets, and instructions
Comes nicely packaged, which makes it ideal for gift-giving
cons: Some gardeners may prefer more than just 3 types of herb seeds
Rare reports of a broken pot upon arrival, but customer service is attentive

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product-Reordering for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Came quick and in perfect condition! Was sad to see the product sold out in stores but knowing it’s available online was fantastic! Great product for anyone trying to grow their own herbs or just implement a healthier life. Would highly recommend. Price point is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Holt

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea for those who are hard to please!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product for my girlfriend’s mother over the holidays. She has quite the green thumb and her kitchen it full of plants. Thought this would be a great addition to her kitchen. Easy to store and maintain, this was a truly a great gift idea and she found it to be very thoughtful. Came in a nice package which added to the gift!
customer_reviews.author: ROHAN MATHUR

customer_reviews.title: The TotalGreen Holland product was a great purchase! So happy with my herbs- can't believe ...
customer_reviews.text: The TotalGreen Holland product was a great purchase! So happy with my herbs- can't believe how quickly and beautifully they're growing (just a few days). I don't have much of a green thumb, but these herbs seem to be happy and are thriving! The instructions were easy to follow and the set up was a lot of fun for me and my kids. It includes everything you need to grow your own herb garden.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Farr

customer_reviews.title: It's super easy to plant and comes with clear directions
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present, and we just recently planted the seeds so they haven't sprouted yet. It's super easy to plant and comes with clear directions. My only complaint is they want you to place the watered pots in their paper/cardboard holder that looks like wood, but if we did they would leak all over the table or whatever they were on. We have them on a towel instead.
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to my mother as a gift and she's very happy with the herb trio kit and I'm very appreciative for TotalGreen Holland delivering such a great product in a very simple fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Marten Jonsson

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed. I reaped a few sprouts in each pot ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. I reaped a few sprouts in each pot ~ just enough to get excited, and that's when the growing stopped. They are perfect size to sit on a kitchen ledge, and I have just started some new plants from seeds and I am hoping that I will have better luck this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product without and write how to have soil for plant. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Chan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Plants do now grow. Very small and not doing well at all
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: They all died even though I followed the instructions for care and maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really love this product! It came very fast and it is the perfect size for my window display.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Stemmle

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The plants sprouted but the chives quickly died. They also don't really grow much...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The plants didn't grow. I'm bummed, but maybe I can re-use the pots.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions, gave them sunlight, kept the soil moist (but not soaked), and bought herb fertilizer. The plants started sprouting within a couple of days, but never grew beyond a centimeter out of the soil. The dirt pods were pretty impressive. I've never seen that before. You add a little bit of water and instantly the pot is filled with soil. I want to just buy those packets so I can plant other seeds myself.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lib

customer_reviews.title: For kids?
customer_reviews.text: I wasted my time and money. Started great, then the chives died, for no apparent reason
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl D.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived chipped and with 3 little bags of the same herb (chives). It looks cheap and it’s simply not worth it
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Bought this thinking there was a wooden base for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking there was a wooden base for the pots. Not so much. Will be returning this and just getting some pots with a tray.
customer_reviews.author: W.B.V

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed. I also passed the return date which ...
customer_reviews.text: The seeds have not at all bloomed!! Super disappointed. I also passed the return date which they have kept of only a month, and they say the seeds take 4-6 weeks to grow. I hope seller can help me
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: disappointment high
customer_reviews.text: Only received seed packs for basil and chives. Chives packet was split open so seeds all over box. Did not even try to recover. Hope 1of3 works ok. Was sooo looking forward to this...disappointment high
customer_reviews.author: Melin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: One tried to grow then died. The others never even grew.😑
customer_reviews.author: SAW7

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this Kitchen Herb Trio Kit b/c it looked like it contained a shelf
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this Kitchen Herb Trio Kit b/c it looked like it contained a shelf. The "shelf" is a piece of cardboard. Not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dana S.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: One pot broken in multiple pieces even though the container and shipping box were totally fine. Seriously disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
